Rarity: Limited Edition

Team-Up: 3 or More Sidekicks
If your force has 3 or more Sidekicks, friendly Captains and Sidekicks have Passenger: 1. If they already have Passenger: 1 (such as from Wing symbol), they have Passenger: 2 instead.
0 Points
Special Powers
TEAM-UP: 3 OR MORE SIDEKICKS: If your force has 3 or more Sidekicks, friendly Captains and Sidekicks have Passenger: 1. If they already have Passenger: 1 (such as from Wing symbol), they have Passenger: 2 instead.
